So far as his opportunities extend, every one who has received the light of truth is under the same responsibility as was the prophet of Israel to whom came the 
                                                                           13
word, "Son of man, I have set thee a watchman unto the house of Israel; therefore thou shalt hear the word at My mouth, and warn them from Me."--Testimonies, vol. 9, pp. 19, 20.
